topics.title: Mathematics for ML
topics.description: Learn linear algebra, calculus, and probability.

subtopics.title: Linear Algebra
subtopics.description: Covers vectors, matrices, eigenvalues, and eigenvectors, which are essential for understanding data transformations and ML algorithms.

subtopics.title: Calculus
subtopics.description: Focuses on derivatives, integrals, and optimization techniques used in training ML models.

subtopics.title: Probability & Statistics
subtopics.description: Explores probability distributions, statistical inference, and hypothesis testing, which are crucial for data analysis and model evaluation.

topics.title: Programming
topics.description: Master Python basics and data structures.

subtopics.title: Python Basics
subtopics.description: Introduces Python syntax, control structures, and functions, forming the foundation for ML programming.

subtopics.title: Data Structures
subtopics.description: Covers lists, dictionaries, stacks, queues, and trees, which are essential for efficient data manipulation.

subtopics.title: Algorithms
subtopics.description: Explores sorting, searching, and dynamic programming, which are critical for optimizing ML workflows.

topics.title: Data Analysis
topics.description: Explore Pandas, NumPy, and data visualization.

subtopics.title: Pandas
subtopics.description: Focuses on data manipulation and analysis using the Pandas library, including dataframes and series.

subtopics.title: NumPy
subtopics.description: Covers numerical computations and array operations, which are fundamental for handling large datasets.

subtopics.title: Data Visualization
subtopics.description: Explores tools like Matplotlib and Seaborn for creating visual representations of data.

subtopics.title: Regression
subtopics.description: Focuses on predicting continuous values using techniques like linear regression and polynomial regression.

subtopics.title: Classification
subtopics.description: Covers algorithms like logistic regression, decision trees, and k-nearest neighbors for categorizing data.

subtopics.title: Support Vector Machines (SVM)
subtopics.description: Explores SVMs for classification and regression tasks, including kernel methods.

subtopics.title: Clustering
subtopics.description: Covers techniques like hierarchical clustering and DBSCAN for grouping similar data points.

subtopics.title: Principal Component Analysis (PCA)
subtopics.description: Focuses on dimensionality reduction to simplify datasets while retaining important information.

subtopics.title: K-Means
subtopics.description: Explores the K-Means algorithm for partitioning data into clusters.

topics.title: Model Evaluation
topics.description: Study metrics like accuracy, precision, and recall.

subtopics.title: Metrics
subtopics.description: Covers accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score, and ROC-AUC for evaluating model performance.

subtopics.title: Cross-Validation
subtopics.description: Explores techniques like k-fold cross-validation to assess model generalizability.

subtopics.title: Confusion Matrix
subtopics.description: Focuses on visualizing classification performance using true/false positives and negatives.

topics.title: Deep Learning
topics.description: Dive into neural networks, CNNs, and RNNs.

subtopics.title: Neural Networks
subtopics.description: Covers the basics of feedforward and backpropagation in artificial neural networks.

subtopics.title: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)
subtopics.description: Focuses on image processing and feature extraction using convolutional layers.

subtopics.title: Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs)
subtopics.description: Explores sequence modeling and time-series data analysis using RNNs and LSTMs.

subtopics.title: Text Processing
subtopics.description: Covers tokenization, stemming, lemmatization, and other preprocessing techniques.

subtopics.title: Transformers
subtopics.description: Explores transformer architectures like BERT and GPT for advanced NLP tasks.

subtopics.title: Sentiment Analysis
subtopics.description: Focuses on classifying text sentiment using supervised and unsupervised methods.

topics.title: Reinforcement Learning
topics.description: Learn about agents, rewards, and policies.

subtopics.title: Q-Learning
subtopics.description: Covers the basics of Q-learning for solving Markov decision processes.

subtopics.title: Policy Gradients
subtopics.description: Explores policy-based methods for optimizing agent behavior in reinforcement learning.

subtopics.title: Deep Reinforcement Learning
subtopics.description: Focuses on combining deep learning with reinforcement learning for complex tasks.
